title: Rebrand to Furever in Our Hearts and update hero gallery with headstone memorials

requirements.text: Change all instances of 'Eternal Paws' branding to 'Furever in Our Hearts' across the entire site including header logo, footer branding, page title, and any other text references

quotes: Change the name from eternal paws to furever in our hearts

acceptanceCriteria: Header displays 'Furever in Our Hearts' as the brand name
Footer shows 'Furever in Our Hearts' branding
No references to 'Eternal Paws' remain anywhere on the site

requirements.text: Replace the top row of showcase images with the headstone memorial photo featuring the yorkie named Nabi

quotes: change the top row of pictures to the headstone photo

acceptanceCriteria: Top row of memorial showcase displays only the headstone design with yorkie
Image shows grass and pebble stones at the base as in the hero image

requirements.text: Create headstone-style memorial designs for the bird and cat, each featuring grass and small pebble stones at the base, matching the yorkie headstone aesthetic

quotes: put the bird and cat in a headstone

acceptanceCriteria: Bird memorial displays as a headstone with grass and pebbles at base
Cat memorial displays as a headstone with grass and pebbles at base
Both match the visual style of the yorkie headstone

requirements.text: Add a nameplate at the bottom of each headstone memorial (yorkie, bird, and cat) displaying the animal's name - Nabi for the yorkie, and appropriate names for the bird and cat

quotes: Put a name plate at bottom of each with name of animal

acceptanceCriteria: Yorkie headstone displays 'Nabi' on a nameplate at the bottom
Bird headstone displays the bird's name on a nameplate at the bottom
Cat headstone displays the cat's name on a nameplate at the bottom
Nameplates are clearly visible and styled consistently across all memorials

constraints: Maintain existing backend photo storage functionality
Preserve upload form and validation logic
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (hooks/useInternetIdentity, hooks/useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Changing the memorial creation process steps

required: Headstone memorial with a realistic bird portrait, nameplate with 'Tweety' at bottom, grass and small pebble stones at base (bird-headstone.dim_600x800.png)
Headstone memorial with a realistic cat portrait, nameplate with 'Whiskers' at bottom, grass and small pebble stones at base (cat-headstone.dim_600x800.png)
edits: Update nameplate text to read 'Nabi' more prominently (yorkie-headstone-nabi.png > yorkie-headstone-nabi-v2.dim_600x800.png)
